name: Hose It Down!
description:
You're just a little bunny trying his best to put out all the fire!

Save all the items before they burn up!

Be careful though, it's terribly hard to control the fire hose!

---------------------

My submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 "Out of Control".

All art/code created by me. Note that there is (currently) no audio.

--------------------

Controls

W / Up Arrow
Move forward
S / Down Arrow
Move backward
A / Left Arrow
Move left
D / Right Arrow
Move right
Space / Left Mouse Button
Move up
Left Shift / Right Mouse Button
Move down
